descriptionHtml:
Work in Progress.

Adds Modern Weapons and ammo to skyrim.
This is not intended to be lore frendly at all.

--:Added:--

Minigun
Sounds for the Minigun
Ammo



--:To do:--
Fix the position of the minigun.
If you drop the minigun on the ground it vill float and you cant pick it up.
Cant see the Minigun in 3\'rd persion. (semi fixed it\'s at your feets)
Ammo shows as a red warning triangle.


Add more weapons

--:Fixed:--
Cant fire unless in \"god\" mode


--:Info:--
It is not added to the world yet so you have to add it with the console(ยง). Just type \"help minigun\".
Then \"player.additem xxxxxxx 1\" with the code you get from the first command.


Because i\'m not to good at 3d or textures this vill take some time to fix.
If someone wants to use this mod and/or help me send me a PM.
Added to steam http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=16968
author: drdrago87
